errors.label-required: Label is required to input text
errors.type-required: Type is required to input text
errors.type-must-be-string: DiscordInputText `type` prop must be a string.
errors.type-required-variant: DiscordInputText `type` prop must be one of: 'short', 'paragraph'

must-be-between-length: - Must be between {{minLength}} and {{maxLength}} in length.
increase-length_one: Please lengthen this text to {{minLength}} characters or more (you are currently using {{calculatedCharactersCount}} character)
increase-length_other: Please lengthen this text to {{minLength}} characters or more (you are currently using {{calculatedCharactersCount}} characters)
required-minimum-length: Must be {{minLength}} characters or more in length.
